Description: Book of the Dead of Ani; frame 7; full colour vignettes; red borders. Spell 17 l. 1-35.
Curator's comments: Published: Le Pharaon-Soleil Catalogue (Paris 1993): p. 100. Goyon, Golvin, Martinet, La construction Pharaonique, p.23 fig.3. Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 37, 100.
